column2: "I hate how they attack as a group. It's so not cool. I mean, really, what the heck, dude?"
"That Guardinane commander unit? Just as it came in, those Guardinanes started moving as a unit all at once!"
"That was some major trouble! I mean, there's so many of them and they're so insane!"
"Anyway, let me watch how YOU handle it. Go give it your best shot!"
